title: 四面佛三十籤第十六籤
poem: 草木逢春自發芽,福從天申到吾家,謀望求財皆遂意,東西南北遇吉星。

analysis.zh: 身體的小毛病將自然痊癒，無需擔憂，現在仍有機會進一步加強體質。財運在春天將顯著轉好，福祿自天降臨，若以求財為願，事業將順遂；四面八方的財神也會相隨。此時不必奢望，情感將悄然萌芽，幸福將隨之而來。正是追尋愛情的最佳時機，走到哪裡都能感受到喜悅。事業亦因春意而得以發展，貴人相助將隨之而至。若欲致富，亦將遇到良機，無論身處何地皆可得益。
analysis.en: Minor physical ailments will heal naturally; there is no need for worry, and it is still possible to strengthen one’s health now. Financial luck improves markedly in spring; blessings descend from heaven, and if you wish to acquire wealth, success is inevitable—divine finance spirits from all directions will accompany you. At this time there is no need for extravagant desires; feelings will bloom quietly, and happiness will follow. It is the ideal moment to pursue love, bringing joy wherever you go. Career prospects also flourish with the spring spirit, and a benefactor will assist. If you seek wealth, favorable opportunities will arise regardless of location.
analysis.jp: 身体の小さな病気は自然に治り、心配する必要はありません。今からでも体を鍛える機会があります。財運は春になると大きく改善され、福祉は天から降り注ぎます。金銭を求めるならば、願いは必ず叶い、四方から財神が同行します。この時は贅沢を望む必要はなく、感情が静かに芽生え、幸福が訪れます。愛を求めるには最適な時期で、どこに行っても喜びを感じるでしょう。仕事も春の息吹とともに発展し、恩人が助けてくれます。お金を稼ぎたいなら、良い機会がどこにいても訪れます。

rag_analysis:
According to the poem, the core meaning is:
- Spring’s renewal is likened to personal growth and prosperity, symbolized by grass and trees sprouting anew.
- Blessings that ‘descend from heaven’ suggest fortune arriving effortlessly.
- The line about seeking wealth coming true conveys that intention aligned with opportunity is likely to succeed.
- ‘Auspicious stars from all directions’ implies comprehensive support, luck surrounding the seeker from every angle.
- The poem encourages taking advantage of this favorable season, stressing patience and openness rather than forcefulness.
